data.enText: a desperate craving to be loved

tr: an intense desire for some particular thing

example.ex: There may be certain times of day when smokers crave their cigarette...
example.tran: 吸烟者可能会在一天中的某些时刻特别想吸烟。

example.ex: You may be craving for some fresh air.
example.tran: 你可能很想呼吸呼吸新鲜空气。

value.def: If you crave something, you want to have it very much.
